main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Wichita, Kansas, in 1953 and 1954, involving descriptions of circular objects with bright lights and high speeds.
interesting points: One sighting described a 40 to 50 feet diameter circular object flying at an altitude of about 2,000 feet before suddenly losing altitude and accelerating rapidly out of sight.
An investigation confirmed the accuracy of a witness's report on the UFO sighting.
The reported sighting in 1953 was considered to be possibly the planet Venus, which was prominent in the northwest sky at that time.
The comments on a 1955 report concluded that the sighting was probably caused by an aircraft.
Photographs were included in one of the reports.
